title: Лікарка за покликанням
overview: "The Doctor by Vocation" is a Ukrainian series based on the story of Ohmatdyt's life during the first 50 days of the full-scale invasion. The series tells the story of a talented doctor who, amid a family crisis, decides to stay in Ukraine and work in a hospital during the war. Despite personal dramas and difficult conditions, she and her colleagues tirelessly save patients' lives.
